title: sequence_positional_annotations
description: JSON schema to store sequence annotations for the 1D coordinate service

target_id.description: Database identifier associated to the annotation
Database identifier associated to the annotation

entry_id.description: This item references an entry in core_entry

assembly_id.description: This item references an assembly in core_assembly

entity_id.description: This item references an entity in core_polymer_entity

asym_id.description: This item references an instance in core_polymer_entity_instance

uniprot_id.description: This item references a UniProt document in core_uniprot

interface_id.description: This item references an interface in core_interface

interface_partner_index.description: This item references a partner of an interface in core_interface

examples: Software generated binding site for ligand entity 2 component HEM instance C chain A

type.description: A type or category of the feature

provenance_source.description: Original database or software name used to obtain the feature

value.description: Numerical value associated with the feature

feature_positions.description: List of documents that describes the location of the feature

beg_seq_id.description: Index at which this segment of the feature begins

end_seq_id.description: Index at which this segment of the feature ends. If the positional feature maps to a single residue this field will be null

beg_ori_id.description: Index at which this segment of the feature begins on the original provenance_source. When reference and source point to the same reference system this file will be null

end_ori_id.description: Index at which this segment of the feature ends on the original provenance_source. If the positional feature maps to a single residue this field will be null. When reference and source point to the same reference system this file will be null

range_id.description: Fragment identifier that groups a set of ranges resulting from gaps

open_begin.description: Flag that indicates the feature begins before the feature index begin

open_end.description: Flag that indicates the feature end after the feature index end

value.description: The value for the feature at this region

values.description: The value(s) for the feature at this region
